sentences.en: A pack of wolves ravening about in the forest.
sentences.cn: 一群狼在森林中到处觅食.

sentences.en: A rapacious divorcee on the prowl; ravening creditors; paying taxes to voracious governments.
sentences.cn: 一个四处徘徊的贪婪的离婚者；贪婪的债主；交税给贪婪的政府。

sentences.en: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they ravening wolves.
sentences.cn: 你们要提防假先知.他们来到你们面前,外表看来像绵羊, 里面却是凶狠的豺狼.

sentences.en: He says the media are ravening wolves.
sentences.cn: 他说媒体就如同饿狼一般。

sentences.en: It is the ravening lion roaming the earth seeking whom it may devour.
sentences.cn: 它就像荒野中游荡的狮子,在寻找可以吞食的猎物.

sentences.en: The lion was ravening the prey.
sentences.cn: 那只狮子在贪婪地吞食着捕获的猎物.

sentences.en: The ravening monsters that would burn the world to a cinder just to watch it burn.
sentences.cn: 掠夺成性的怪物.令世界燃为灰烬的目的,仅仅是为了观看世界的燃烧.

sentences.en: The roaring lion was ravening the prey.
sentences.cn: 那只怒吼的狮子贪婪地吞食捕获物.

sentences.en: They gaped upon me with their mouths a ravening and a roaring lion.
sentences.cn: 他们向我张口,好像抓撕吼叫的狮子.

sentences.en: They gaped upon me with their mouths, as a ravening and a roaring lion.
sentences.cn: 13他们向我张口, 好像抓撕吼叫的狮子.

sentences.en: They open wide their mouth at me , As a ravening and a roaring lion.
sentences.cn: 诗22:13他们向我张口、好像抓撕吼叫的狮子.

words.tran_cn: 贪婪的；渴望的；狼吞虎咽的
